author: cnbc.com
title: Ross Stores Announces Fourth Quarter and Fiscal 2017 Earnings Release and Conference Call
text:
Dublin, CA, Feb. 20, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ﻿Ross Stores, Inc. (Nasdaq: ROST) will announce its fourth quarter and fiscal 2017 earnings results on Tuesday, March 6, 2018. A press release will be sent out at approximately 4:00 p.m. Eastern time.
The Company will also provide additional details concerning its fourth quarter and fiscal 2017 results and business outlook on a conference call to be held on Tuesday, March 6, 2018 at 4:15 p.m. Eastern time. Participants may listen to a real-time audio webcast of the conference call by visiting the Investors section of the Company’s website located at www.rossstores.com .
A recorded version of the call will also be available at the website address, as well as via a telephone recording at 404-537-3406, Passcode #5783629, through 8:00 p.m. Eastern time on March 13, 2018.
Julie Chapman 925-965-4535 juliea.chapman@ros.com
Source:Ross Stores, Inc.
